item.title: Young tree in danger of dying as support gone, 19th October
item.description:
The grass verge cutters knocked into and took down one of the supports of a fairly newish planted tree. The tree is now at an angle and needs to be supported properly before it uproots and dies. The pole which was there beside the tree has now been removed by someone having been on the ground by the tree for a few days. The tree is outside number 11 Belmont Lane, BR7 6BH
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Belmont Lane, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet
